name: Kosm
description:
(This game can be finished, and is playable beginning to end)

This is my second game that I've developed during my time on my course. Unlike my previous game that was done in 2d, this game was entirely made using 3D. So I had to use various 3D software during development, such as maya and substance painter.

SPACE - Jump

CTRL- Crouch

ESC- Pause

1 - Unsheath and sheath sword

LFTCLK - Attack

E - Interact

NOTE: Wireframes of attacks appear. The AI is known to be slightly spotty.
